description: This is a mold with 25 identical ball indentations meant to be poured with molten metal and then cooled. This mold produces standardized pellets to be fired from air guns via shotshells.
This is a mold with 25 identical hole indentations meant to be poured with molten metal and then cooled. This mold produces thin flechettes to be fired from air guns via shotshells.

A simple shell press meant to create powderless shotshells out of paper. A plank has been sawn to the shape of a pin and is movable, while the press board has an indent with the diameter of a nailhead to place paper into. By pressing down the top part, the paper will be formed into the shell by the pin, ready to be cut out.
